ygData.subject: Re: Money issues
ygData.msgSnippet: at level 20 try Druids in Rathe Mountains be sure to take another Necro with you the bears are a pain but decent loot.  this area can take you all the way to
ygData.messageBody:
at level 20 try Druids in Rathe Mountains be sure to take another Necro with
you the bears are a pain but decent loot. this area can take you all the
way to 30.
-----Original Message-----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 11:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Money issues


>From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
>sure, those things are nice, but why choose money over xp? once you are
>over L20 you can start gathering unto you those things that are yours =)
>its better to spend 2 weeks getting to L20 than spend 2 weeks getting 100pp
>so you can get an item, and only being L18. trust me, patience is the way
>to go- i still have yet to buy any items, and i am L24. not only that, but
>i have some rather good stuff. (does trading count? ive made some good
>trades). i take that back. at L10 i bought a dagger of marnek, and later
on
>i bought some int rings. i also bought a dragoon dirk. but total that was
>around 50pp, if that.
>
>belphenor
>
>
>
>>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>>
>>hm...silly question, but where is the single spawn
>>aviak? I am not that familiar with the zone, since it
>>seems to be extremly crowded all the time.
>>
>>I want money to buy some of the perks...like a
>>savant's cap, or intelligence earrings. :)
>>
>>--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>> > From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>> >
>> > Overall I don't see any use for money except buying
>> > important spells at
>> > those levels. As of right now I would suggest that
>> > you take on some Aviak
>> > Guards in Lake Rathe and fight them for a bit. They
>> > have decent loot and
>> > great exp. All you really need to do is level money
>> > will begin to roll in
>> > the 20's and you'll be fine again money wise.
>> >
>> > Naeeldar
>> >
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> > To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>> > <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>

>> >
>> >
>> > >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> > >
>> > >I am a level 16 necromancer, and I am completely
>> > >broke. As of last night, I am worth 3pp and some
>> > >change. Could you all please give me some ideas on
>> > >getting money? Killing wisps is extremely boring to
>> > me
>> > >since they take forever to track down, don't get
>> > exp,
>> > >and with my luck I get a non-burned out lightstone
>> > >once out of 10 times. Lavastorm is boring too since
>> > >that is where i spent level 10-12, and dervishes
>> > are
>> > >the same story since that was 12-14.
>> > >
>> > >Any ideas, please? :)
>> > >
>> > >Darkmoon 16th circle necromancer.
>> > >

>> > abusive language will not be
